meanings.definition: A connection or relationship between two or more things.
meanings.sent1: The linkups between the two ideas were clear and easy to understand.
meanings.sent2: The linkups between the different parts of the project helped it come together smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The linkups between the puzzle pieces made it easy to solve.
meanings.sent4: The linkups between the characters in the story created a web of relationships.
meanings.sent5: The linkups between the stars in the sky formed beautiful constellations.

meanings.definition: A gathering or meeting of people or organizations for a specific purpose.
meanings.sent1: The linkups for the charity event were well-attended and successful.
meanings.sent2: The linkups between the different departments helped improve communication.
meanings.sent3: The linkups at the conference led to interesting discussions and new ideas.
meanings.sent4: The linkups between the teams resulted in a productive brainstorming session.
meanings.sent5: The linkups between the community members strengthened bonds and unity.

meanings.definition: The act of joining or connecting two or more things together.
meanings.sent1: The linkups of the train cars allowed for a smooth journey.
meanings.sent2: The linkups of the cables ensured a strong and stable connection.
meanings.sent3: The linkups of the building blocks created a tall and impressive tower.
meanings.sent4: The linkups of the branches formed a natural canopy overhead.
meanings.sent5: The linkups of the gears made the machine run efficiently.
